text:
This is possible, you would want to build your module to support it.

My suggestion would be to use the alignment module field. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/en/docs/cms/building-blocks/module-theme-fields#alignment>

If your theme has breakpoints enabled, you can then set different values in your template for mobile or desktop. This also means the end user can change the value in the page editor for desktop/mobile.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/themes/responsive-breakpoints>
